Dick Cheney: s statement about the number of terrorists doubling, which was the basis of the claim.
The report released by the Rand Corporat: which supported Cheney's claim and focused on the rise of Salafi-jihadist groups.
The use of publicly available documents: such as internal memos and statements obtained from al-Qaida and other leaders, to gather information for the report.
The distinction between Salafi: jihadist groups and formal members of al-Qaida, including the dismissal of ISIS as part of al-Qaida by Ayman al-Zawahiri in January 2014.
